sentences.en: Europe's economies have converged in several areas. More interestingly, there has been convergence in economic growth rates.
sentences.cn: 欧洲的经济已在多个领域互相趋同；更有意思的是，各国经济增长率也渐趋一致。

sentences.en: Her latest conquest is an Italian who, interestingly enough, doesn't speak a word of his native language.
sentences.cn: 她新搭上了个意大利人。有意思的是，那个意大利人一句意大利语都不会说。

sentences.en: Interestingly , the term carbon may be used for both types of fibers.
sentences.cn: 这两种纤维都可以称作碳纤维.

sentences.en: Interestingly enough, a few weeks later, Benjamin remarried.
sentences.cn: 有意思的是，几个星期以后，本杰明又结婚了。

sentences.en: Interestingly enough, Pearson made no attempt to deny the rumour.
sentences.cn: 很有趣的是，皮尔逊没有试图否认谣传。

sentences.en: Interestingly Panasonic said exactly the same thing about the G 1.
sentences.cn: 问:有意思了,松下也是这样描述他们的G1.

sentences.en: Interestingly, Americans who heard the debate on radio thought Nixon had won.
sentences.cn: 有趣的是, 那些从广播中收听辩论的人认为尼克松赢了.

sentences.en: Interestingly, he was only seven when he composed the sonata.
sentences.cn: 有趣的是, 他写那一首奏呜曲时,年仅七岁.

sentences.en: Interestingly, it has a slightly different taste in each family.
sentences.cn: 最好喝的永远是自己妈妈亲手做的大酱汤啊.

sentences.en: Interestingly, none of their three children ever married.
sentences.cn: 有趣的是，他们的三个孩子都一直没有结婚。

sentences.en: Interestingly, once Faith's account got really big, things apparently went south.
sentences.cn: 有趣的是, 一旦费思的账户变大了, 事情明显就变坏了.

sentences.en: Interestingly, panic appears in many other languages besides English.
sentences.cn: 有趣的是, panic( 慌乱)这个词不仅出现在英语里,还出现在很多其他语言里.

sentences.en: Interestingly, PP 2 A has been described to inhibit also insulin signaling in adipocytes.
sentences.cn: 有趣的是, PP2A已经被认定还可以在脂肪细胞中抑制胰岛素信号通路.

sentences.en: Interestingly, Sun Zi advocated understanding the weather first before understanding the terrain.
sentences.cn: 很妙的是孙子主张知天先于知地.

sentences.en: Interestingly, the sheet contains left - handed and right - handed helical chains.
sentences.cn: 它最有趣的特征是层中含有左手螺旋链和右手螺旋链.

sentences.en: Interestingly, the team's success came from stem cells with XY ( male ) chromosomes.
sentences.cn: 有趣的是, 这个研究小组只培育成功自带XY ( 男性 ) 染色体的干细胞.

sentences.en: Most interestingly, they are demanding that a national working party on crimes against women and children be established.
sentences.cn: 最令人关注的是，他们要求针对侵害妇女和儿童的犯罪成立全国专案组。

words.tran_cn: 感兴趣的；有权益的；有成见的
有趣的；引起兴趣的，令人关注的
兴趣，爱好；利息；趣味；同行
使……感兴趣；引起……的关心；使……参与

trans.tran_en: used to introduce a fact that you think is interesting
